content.en: Catalyst discovery: Scientists are using machine learning algorithms to accelerate the discovery of new catalysts for various chemical reactions. These algorithms are trained with data from simulations and experiments to accurately predict the reactivity and activity of different materials. By combining machine learning with other computational methods, researchers are able to explore a wide range of catalysts and uncover the underlying mechanisms behind their performance.
content.da: Katalysatoropdagelse: Forskere bruger maskinlæringsalgoritmer til at fremskynde opdagelsen af nye katalysatorer til forskellige kemiske reaktioner. Disse algoritmer trænes med data fra simulationer og eksperimenter for nøjagtigt at forudsige reaktiviteten og aktiviteten af forskellige materialer. Ved at kombinere maskinlæring med andre beregningsmetoder kan forskere udforske et bredt spektrum af katalysatorer og afdække de underliggende mekanismer bag deres ydeevne.
